definition.name: Checkout
definition.description: Checkout a GitHub repository at a particular ref
definition.author: Daniel Flook

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: Repository name with owner. For example, actions/checkout

inputs.name: ref
inputs.description: The branch, tag or SHA to checkout. When checking out the repository that triggered a workflow, this defaults to the reference or SHA for that event.  Otherwise, uses the default branch.

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Token to use when checking out the repository

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Relative path under $GITHUB_WORKSPACE to place the repository

outputs.name: ref
outputs.description: The branch, tag or SHA that was checked out

outputs.name: commit
outputs.description: The commit SHA that was checked out
